 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁכַח‎</span>] **verb Haph\`el** ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 40, 4</sup> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>GGA 1884, 1019</sup>) ==find== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁכַח‎</span> ***find***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex. 205</sup>; Egyptian Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎השכח‎</span> [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>E 5, pass.</sup> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אשתכךְ‎</span> RŠS<sup>361A 2</sup>): — ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הַשְׁכַּ֫חַת‎</span> [[Dan.2.25|Dan 2:25]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הַשְׁכַּ֫חוּ‎</span> [[Ezra.4.19|Ezra 4:19]]; [[Dan.6.12|Dan 6:12]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּהַשְׁכַּת‎</span> [[Ezra.4.15|Ezra 4:15]]; [[Ezra.7.16|Ezra 7:16]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְהַשְׁכָּחָה‎</span> [[Dan.6.5|Dan 6:5]] (twice in verse); — ***find***, accusative of thing, [[Dan.6.5|Dan 6:5]] (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> person), v.[[Dan.6.5|Dan 6:5]] v.[[Dan.6.6|Dan 6:6]] (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> person), v.[[Dan.6.6|Dan 6:6]] (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עַל‎</span> person, accusative of thing omitted), [[Ezra.7.16|Ezra 7:16]] (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ב‎</span> location); followed by clause <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דִּי‎</span> [[Ezra.4.15|Ezra 4:15]] (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ב‎</span> location), v[[Ezra.4.19|Ezra 4:19]] accusative of person [[Dan.2.25|Dan 2:25]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> person [[Dan.6.12|Dan 6:12]] ( + participle action.). **Hithpe\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הִשְׁתְּכַח‎</span> [[Dan.2.35|Dan 2:35]] +, 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כַ֫חַתְּ‎</span>- [[Dan.5.27|Dan 5:27]], 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כַ֫חַת‎</span>- [[Dan.5.11|Dan 5:11]] +; ***be found***, subject thing, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ב‎</span> location, [[Ezra.6.2|Ezra 6:2]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ב‎</span> person [[Dan.5.11|Dan 5:11]]; [[Dan.5.12|Dan 5:12]]; [[Dan.5.14|Dan 5:14]]; [[Dan.6.24|Dan 6:24]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עַל‎</span> person v.[[Dan.6.5|Dan 6:5]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> person + <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קֳדָם‎</span> person v.[[Dan.6.23|Dan 6:23]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> of thing [[Dan.2.35|Dan 2:35]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲתַר‎</span>); subject person [[Dan.5.27|Dan 5:27]] + <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חַסִּר‎</span> ***thou hast been found wanting*** ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 85, 3</sup>). <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שַׁכְלְלֵהּ‎</span> etc., see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כלל‎</span>.
